parameters.name: Area
parameters.description:
The region. You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation to query regions.

*   If you do not specify a region, data in all regions is queried.
*   If you specify a region, data in the specified region is queried. You can specify one or more regions. If you specify multiple regions, separate the regions with commas (,).

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name that you want to query. Separate domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: HttpCode
parameters.description:
The HTTP status code. Valid values:

*   **2xx**
*   **3xx**
*   **4xx**
*   **5xx**

If you do not specify this parameter, all HTTP status codes are queried.

parameters.name: IsOverseas
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the region is outside the Chinese mainland. Valid values:

*   **1**: outside the Chinese mainland
*   **0**: inside the Chinese mainland

parameters.name: ReportId
parameters.description: The ID of the operations report that you want to query. You can specify only one ID in each request. You can call the [DescribeCdnSubList](~~271655~~) operation to query report IDs.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
